description:
Long days on the water, the snow, or anywhere you can’t escape the sun are made better with a good pair of sunglasses. Cablz Zipz adjustable retainers slip on your sunnie’s temples and help keep your sunglasses right where you want them. A simple adjustable design keeps Zipz comfortably off your neck.

  • Coated cable and silicone will not absorb moisture, making these great on, or around water, and in humid environments
  • 25, 30, and 35cm lengths are fully adjustable
  • Retainer ends stretch to fit most sunglass temples (5-15mm)
  • Installation tip, dip the retainer end in rubbing alcohol, slip on your sunglass’s temples and wipe off and any excess alcohol with a damp cloth
name: Cablz Zipz Eyewear Retainer
